name: Sky Marksman
storyline: Set against the backdrop of lush green meadows and babbling brooks, you step into the shoes of a skilled hunter tasked with the noble duty of safeguarding the tranquility of the countryside from the incessant flights of ducks. As you embark on this challenging journey, you find yourself standing at the edge of a tranquil pond, your trusty rifle in hand, ready to take on the airborne adversaries.
summary: Sky Marksman is a fast-paced game where you aim and shoot ducks flying across your screen. Click 'Start Game' to begin, and remember: every duck that reaches the bottom ends the game.
